name: Block X10:Brick Match
description:
Block X10:Brick Match is a wonderful stimulating block puzzle. This is one of the most entertaining puzzle block games you will ever play. It’s easy, funny, exciting and suitable for all ages. Think and arrange the blocks in the right way in this block puzzledom
HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and match pieces 10 x 10
• Fill any rows or columns to get score, no need to care the colors
• You can't rotate blocks
• Survive as long as you can
